title: Technology-Integrated Social Problem-Solving Project

context.prior_knowledge: Social issue analysis, professional work experience, and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Collaborative projects for professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields to solve social issues linked with technological solutions

learning_goals: Structured project planning that analyzes real-world social issues through integration with technological tools
Team-based project management using digital collaboration tools (Google Workspace, Trello, etc.)
Presenting solutions to social issues using data visualization tools (Tableau, RawGraphs, etc.)
Creating technology-integrated learning portfolios using personal devices in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
